NAEB BOARD
May 18, 195U
Kr. Sulzberger is prepared to invite up to seventy five people to dinner
that evening but Mrs. Reid will be expecting a maximum of thirty people
which I assume would include only the members of the board and their presidents
This means that we may invite to the Times dinner a number of additional
people* Please forward to ms ary suggestions you may have for additional
people and I will pass the list on to Dicky
Letâ€™s get to work on this immediately*
